features: 【Fun Puzzle Games】Choose LUHYAUAN to redefine the meaning of the game console. This is a handheld video games that integrates entertainment, sports, interaction, education and leisure. Built-in 348 new games, which include Sports, Logic, Memory, Adventure, Racing, Puzzle, Math and non-violence as well as other games type.Create healthy mind and body for children. The kids hand-eye coordination, thinking and problem solving skills are improved when they are playing games.

【HD Display & Play on TV】The 3.0-inch high definition ​display screen can be connected to the TV via the AV output, so your child can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen and better eye protection. It's the perfect choice for game night. It can enhance the parent-child relationship and create a good family atmosphere.

【Lightweight and Compact】Easy to carry travel electronic toys, mini body, take it anywhere. Tailored for children, easy to use and qucik to start. Of course, this vintage video game console can also take you back to childhood memories. On the way to work,free time, the best choice for relaxing mood. Play anytime, anywhere, enjoy the fun of train childhood, airplane, camping or travel.

【Long Use Time】Built-in a rechargeable 800mAh large capacity lithium battery, providing a steady stream of energy for your child's happiness. Save your money by not having to buy and replace batteries frequently. The game can play for up to 5 hours each time it is fully charged. Flexible power supply mode will bring your child a lot of joy and happiness during the trip or long journey.(Note: Please fully charge the battery before the first use.)

【Surprise Gift & Worry-free purchase】The handheld games console for kids age 8-12 would be definitely surprise you and your child. As a birthday, Christmas, party gifts are very cool and perfect. Please contact us if you have questions. We can offer you a full refund or free replacement within 30 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your child always comes first. To help him or her develop important aptitudes and learning abilities from a very young age, we have developed a premium video game console! Why is this product for you? Perfect Edutainment Toy: The amazing handheld game console is a great learning opportunity for toddlers ages 4 and up. Built-in 348 games(Logic & math, Sports, Puzzle, Arcade, Shooting, Action, Racing, Strategy, Adventure, Card games,ect.) can help your child develop his imagination, hand-eye coordination, and cognitive skills, all while having fun. 3.0'' High-resolution Screen: It features a colorful LCD screen and supports AV output, not only giving you a high-quality picture and gaming experience, but also making you more stress-free and make you feel better. Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design. Built-in rechargeable lithium battery, eliminates the hassle of buying and replacing batteries frequently. Great Gift: Elegant and stylish design, it is a great gift on special days, such as birthdays, Christmas and other holidays. Bring your kids endless hours of funny and happy childhood memory! It is a great bridge of communication with parents and their friends.You will get more chance to communicate and know more about your kids, you will see the growth of your children.

Play on TV Easy to connect the portable game console with TV(AV cable is included), enjoy the larger screen gaming experience. High Definition Screen Using 3.0'' HD color screen, the right screen size will no longer cause harm to the child's eyesight when playing the retro game console. USB Rechargeable Built-in a rechargeable lithium battery, providing a steady stream of energy your child's happiness. Also support 3*AAA battery(not included) power supply.

Let your toddler have fun and develop his skills with our handheld game console! Note : Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully.In order to get a better game experience, please charging before using!If you hit the screen flashing or blurry, it means you need to charge!Please remove the protective film of the game console screen before use.Make sure that the console is switched “off” before installing batteries.Under the environment with electrostatic discharge,the product may malfunction and require user to reset the product.

reviews.reviewText: It's full of bootleg games that you won't play, but hey it has super mario bros and a few other titles you'll like. The case is pretty sturdy and rhe device is rechargeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well, this little game or device, whatever it's called, the truth is that it doesn't have the joy of being a console. The truth is that games have nothing to do with retro games.Although they do have some fun, to be honest I think it's not worth buying this!Because! Because it costs 30 dollars I don't know if the price is fair and the materials and finishes are terrible.I won't return it because I don't want to waste time on it.I'll just leave it there and I'll see who gave it to But my opinion is don't buy this I think that for 20 pains the up console with 400 games is better
